languages.text: {n}В вокс-трансляцию, вежливо покашливая, просачивается медоточивый голос Высокого фактотума.{/n} "Я бы повременил с уничтожением судна — хотя моральные аспекты их деятельности и вызывают неловкие вопросы, Пустотное братство все же крупный поставщик товаров на местном рынке. Возможно, вы сочтете сделки с ними допустимыми... тем более в условиях, когда варп-перелеты невозможны!"

traits.locale_text: {n}В вокс-трансляцию, вежливо покашливая, просачивается медоточивый голос Высокого Фактотума.{/n} "Я бы повременил с уничтожением судна — хотя моральные аспекты их деятельности и вызывают неловкие вопросы, Пустотное братство все же крупный поставщик товаров на местном рынке. Возможно, вы сочтете сделки с ними допустимыми... тем более в условиях, когда варп-перелеты невозможны!"

languages.text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"
languages.original_text: {n}В вокс-трансляцию, вежливо покашливая, просачивается медоточивый голос Высокого фактотума.{/n} "Я бы повременил с уничтожением судна — хотя моральные аспекты их деятельности и вызывают неловкие вопросы, Пустотное братство все же крупный поставщик товаров на местном рынке. Возможно, вы сочтете сделки с ними допустимыми... тем более в условиях, когда варп-перелеты невозможны!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... Especially when the warp jumps are not available!"

Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... Especially when jumping to warp is impossible!"

Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"

languages.text: {n}La traduction est interrompue par un toussotement poli, suivi de la voix mielleuse du haut factotum.{/n} « J'attendrais un peu avant de détruire ce vaisseau, à votre place. Malgré la moralité douteuse et le mode de vie décadent de ses membres, la Communauté du vide n'en est pas moins un pourvoyeur de marchandises important du marché local. Peut-être consentirez-vous à faire affaire avec eux ? D'autant qu'il nous est impossible de procéder à un saut Warp ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La traduction est interrompue par un toussotement poli, suivi de la voix mielleuse du haut factotum.{/n} « J'attendrais un peu avant de détruire ce vaisseau, à votre place. Malgré la moralité douteuse et le mode de vie décadent de ses membres, la Communauté du vide n'en est pas moins un pourvoyeur de marchandises important du marché local. Peut-être consentirez-vous à faire affaire avec eux ? D'autant qu'il nous est impossible de procéder à un saut Warp ! »

languages.text: {n}Die süßliche Stimme des Hoch-Faktotums unterbricht die Übersetzung mit einem höflichen Räuspern.{/n} "Ich würde an Eurer Stelle noch warten, bevor ich das Schiff zerstöre. Die moralischen Aspekte ihres Broterwerbs werfen zwar einige unangenehme Fragen auf, doch die Gefährten der Leere sind für den örtlichen Markt ein wichtiger Lieferant von Gütern. Vielleicht wäre es für Euch akzeptabel, mit ihnen Handel zu treiben ... vor allem in einer Situation, in der keine Warpsprünge möglich sind.
languages.original_text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die süßliche Stimme des Hoch-Faktotums unterbricht die Übersetzung mit einem höflichen Räuspern.{/n} "Ich würde an Eurer Stelle noch warten, bevor ich das Schiff zerstöre. Die moralischen Aspekte ihres Broterwerbs werfen zwar einige unangenehme Fragen auf, doch die Gefährten der Leere sind für den örtlichen Markt ein wichtiger Lieferant von Gütern. Vielleicht wäre es für Euch akzeptabel, mit ihnen Handel zu treiben ... vor allem in einer Situation, in der keine Warpsprünge möglich sind.

{n}Die süßliche Stimme des Hoch-Faktotums unterbricht die Übersetzung mit einem höflichen Räusperer.{/n} "Ich würde an Eurer Stelle noch warten, bevor ich das Schiff zerstöre. Die moralischen Aspekte ihres Broterwerbs werfen zwar einige unangenehme Fragen auf, doch die Gefährten der Leere sind für den lokalen Markt ein wichtiger Lieferant von Gütern. Vielleicht wäre es für Euch akzeptabel, mit ihnen Handel zu treiben ... Besonders, wenn ein Warpsprung unmöglich ist!"

languages.text: {n}La suave voz del Sumo Factótum interrumpe la explicación con una tos respetuosa.{/n} «En su lugar, esperaría antes de destruir la nave. Aunque la moralidad de su modo de vida es cuestionable, la Hermandad del Vacío sigue siendo uno de los mayores proveedores de material del mercado local. Quizá valore hacer negocios con ellos... ¡Especialmente ahora que las circunstancias actuales nos impiden atravesar la disformidad!».
languages.original_text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La suave voz del Sumo Factótum interrumpe la explicación con una tos respetuosa.{/n} «En su lugar, esperaría antes de destruir la nave. Aunque la moralidad de su modo de vida es cuestionable, la Hermandad del Vacío sigue siendo uno de los mayores proveedores de material del mercado local. Quizá valore hacer negocios con ellos... ¡Especialmente ahora que las circunstancias actuales nos impiden atravesar la disformidad!».

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问礼貌地咳嗽了一声，打断了谈话，以甜得发腻的声音开了口。{/n}“如果我是您的话，我在摧毁这艘船前会先仔细考虑考虑。虽然他们的生意在道德方面确实会引发尴尬的问题，但无论如何，虚空协联仍然是当地市场的主要货物供应商。或许您会认为，与他们打交道这件事情并非无法接受……尤其在是我们无法进行亚空间跳跃的情况下！”
languages.original_text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶顾问礼貌地咳嗽了一声，打断了谈话，以甜得发腻的声音开了口。{/n}“如果我是您的话，我在摧毁这艘船前会先仔细考虑考虑。虽然他们的生意在道德方面确实会引发尴尬的问题，但无论如何，虚空协联仍然是当地市场的主要货物供应商。或许您会认为，与他们打交道这件事情并非无法接受……尤其在是我们无法进行亚空间跳跃的情况下！”

languages.text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムの慇懃な声が、丁寧な咳で翻訳を中断させる。{/n}「私があなたなら、船の破壊を待つでしょう。彼らの生計の道徳的な側面は厄介な問題を引き起こしますが、『虚空の仲間』が地元市場への主要な商品供給者であることに変わりはありません。おそらく彼らとの取引は受け入れられるでしょう……特にワープジャンプの実行が不可能な状況においては！」
languages.original_text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムの慇懃な声が、丁寧な咳で翻訳を中断させる。{/n}「私があなたなら、船の破壊を待つでしょう。彼らの生計の道徳的な側面は厄介な問題を引き起こしますが、『虚空の仲間』が地元市場への主要な商品供給者であることに変わりはありません。おそらく彼らとの取引は受け入れられるでしょう……特にワープジャンプの実行が不可能な状況においては！」

languages.text: {n}Arşıkâhya'nın melodik sesi, çeviriyi nazik bir öksürükle bölüyor.{/n} "Sizin yerinizde olsa gemiyi yok etmek konusunda acele etmezdim. Yaşam biçimlerinin ahlaki yönleri her ne kadar bazı tuhaf soruları akıllara getirse de Uçsuz Kardeşliği, yerel pazarın önemli bir ürün tedarikçisidir. Belki de onlarla anlaşma yapma hususuna makul gözle bakabilirsiniz. Özellikle de öte sıçrama yapmak imkânsızken!"
languages.original_text: {n}The honeyed voice of the High Factotum interrupts the translation with a polite cough.{/n} "I would wait on destroying the vessel if I were you. Although the moral aspects of their livelihood do cause some awkward questions, the Fellowship of the Void remains a major supplier of goods to the local market. Perhaps you will find dealing with them acceptable... especially in a situation where performing a warp jump is impossible!"
